feats: Diehard, Endurance, Great Fortitude, Skill Focus (Perception)
description: This large rhinoceros has a shaggy pelt of long, brown fur and a row of immense horns on its snout and brow.

sections.body: The woolly rhinoceros is an herbivore, though unlike its non-woolly cousin it grazes for food rather than browsing on larger plants. The woolly rhino is legendary for its foul temper, and its size and huge horn give it a ferocious bravery. Any threat (real or perceived) to the rhino or its herd is met with loud bellows and the stomping of feet. Often, those who unwittingly anger a woolly rhino have no time to amend the intrusion before the beast attacks.

name: Rhinoceros, Woolly
